20100.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「そ:

20103.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ニ: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Meow! It's nothing.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20106.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「…:

20107.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>He's hiding something.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20108.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ニ: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Meow! I'm not hiding it from you.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20110.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ウ: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>I'm not lying, Nya!<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20111.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>This. Is this a letter to me?<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20115.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ち:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>No, no, no! That's that thing. It's a

20117.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ニ: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Meow. Sorry, Meow.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20118.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「帰:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>There is a reason why he can't come

20119.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Thank you. I'm fine. I decided to live

20120.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「…:

20121.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「も: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Of course, of course.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20122.<start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n00346 _normal m00001>Well then, good-bye.<stop_lip_animation n00346 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20124.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「…:

20125.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「そ:

20127.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「<:

20128.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「オ:

20129.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「ミ:

20130.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Okay, Yance, the master of Rebelio.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
